title: Farm Animal Sounds Song S0101 | Little Bunny Learns | Nursery Rhymes

tasks.task: Identifying animal sounds at a farm
subtasks: Recognize the sound of a pigeon (coo-coo-coo)
Recognize the sound of a bull (snort, snort, snort)
Recognize the sound of a calf (moo-moo-moo)
Recognize the sound of a chick (peep, peep, peep)
Recognize the sound of a donkey (bray, bray, bray)
Recognize the sound of a llama (hum-hum-hum)
Recognize the sound of a goose (hiss, hiss, hiss)
Recognize the sound of a dove (coo-coo-coo)
